description:
The Appalachian poncho is designed for outdoor living and chilly nights around a campfire. The fabric and kangaroo front pocket will keep you warm.

Made of 100% polyester, its higher front kangaroo pocket remains accessible to keep your hands warm even under your fishing overalls. With an adjustable drawstring hood and elastic cuffs, our Appalachian poncho also features slits on either side of the waist to ensure maximum comfort.

With its original design, it will look great on your days in the wilderness, as well as on chilly evenings at the end of the pier or around a campfire.
name: Hooke Appalachian Poncho - Unisex
